Name: Seven Wonders
About the game: Seven Wonders is an ancient city-building game. It brings you back to ancient times, where you have to build the seven wonders of the ancient world. You have to manage resources and labor to build the wonders. Seven wonders have unique gameplay that will make you master the game and compare your scores with other players around the world. In the game you can choose which civilization you want to play and which wonder you want to build: Wonders: - Great Pyramid of Giza - Hanging Gardens of Babylon - Statue of Zeus at Olympia - Temple of Artemis at Ephesus - Mausoleum at Halicarnassus - Colossus of Rhodes - Lighthouse of Alexandria You will need to gather and collect basic resources which will help you to build the wonders and advance in the game: - Wood - Stone - Bronze - Tin - Copper - Food - Blocks Also in the game, there is a combat system that lets you defend your wonder from barbarians. Compare your scores with other players and master the game and become the real ancient wonder builder!
